recordTypes.name: Utility Billing Final Bill Pay
recordTypes.description: Use this application to make a final utility bill payment, ONLY IF DIRECTED BY VILLAGE STAFF.

recordTypes.name: Block Party Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply for a permit to hold a block party.

recordTypes.name: Family Days Arts & Crafts Vendor Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a vendor at Deerfield Family Days.

recordTypes.name: Building Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is for complete demolition of a structure. (Residential or Commercial)

recordTypes.name: Family Days Food Truck Vendors
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a Food Truck Wednesday vendor.

recordTypes.name: Change of Contractor
recordTypes.description: Use this form to request change of contractors from original permit application.

recordTypes.name: Family Days Parade Participant Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to participate in the Deerfield Family Days Parade.

recordTypes.name: Food Truck Wednesday Vendor Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a Food Truck Wednesday vendor.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Build-Out Permit (Interior Remodel / Tenant Build-Out Only)
recordTypes.description: Use this form for submittals of commercial interior remodel or tenant build-out projects.  NO NEW CONSTRUCTION OR ADDITIONS ACCEPTED VIA THIS FORM.

recordTypes.name: Food Truck Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply for a Village of Deerfield Food Truck Permit.

recordTypes.name: Commercial/Multi-family Construction Permit (New Construction/Addition)
recordTypes.description: New Construction or addition for multi-family residential, commercial, industrial, and institutional buildings.

recordTypes.name: Family Days Corporate Booth/Sponsor Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply for a corporate booth and/or to be a Sponsor at Deerfield Family Days.

recordTypes.name: Contractor Registration
recordTypes.description: Contractors, register to work within the Village using this application.

recordTypes.name: Harvest Fest Food Vendor Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a food vendor at the Deerfield Harvest Fest.

recordTypes.name: Ice Cream Truck Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply for a Village of Deerfield Ice Cream Truck Permit.

recordTypes.name: Deck Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a deck permit.

recordTypes.name: Harvest Fest Sponsor
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a Sponsor of Deerfield Harvest Fest.

recordTypes.name: Detached Accessory Structure Permit
recordTypes.description: Work on detached accessory structures like garages, sheds, pergolas or gazebos.

recordTypes.name: Winter Market Civic Organization Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a vendor at the Deerfield Winter Market.

recordTypes.name: Winter Market Food Vendor Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a food vendor at the Deerfield Winter Market.

recordTypes.name: Driveways, Patios, and Hardscape Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a permit relating to driveways, patios, or other hardscape installations.  Do NOT use this application for sport courts; use the Sport Court Permit Application.

recordTypes.name: Electrical-Only Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for an electrical-only permit.  This application is only for the following types of work:  electrical service repair/upgrade, residential vehicle charging station, generators.

recordTypes.name: Winter Market Vendor Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a vendor at the Deerfield Winter Market.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Certificate of Compliance Application
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a Zoning Certificate of Compliance.

recordTypes.name: Elevator or Conveyance Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a permit for residential or commercial elevator and conveyance projects (installation, modernization, or repair).

recordTypes.name: Fence Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a fence permit.

recordTypes.name: Winter Market Sponsor
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a Sponsor of the Deerfield Winter Market.

recordTypes.name: Garage/Estate Sale Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply for a permit to hold a garage or estate sale.

recordTypes.name: Grading, Drainage, and Foundation Work Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a Grading, Drainage, and Foundation Work permit, including work such as stormwater detention, stormwater discharge (including burying downspouts), drain tile, change of grading on property, window wells, foundation stabilization, foundation membranes, etc...

recordTypes.name: Annual Village Events Sponsor
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply to be a Annual Village Events Sponsor.

recordTypes.name: Hazel Ave Lead Service Replacement Project Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a Hazel Avenue Lead Service Program Project permit ONLY.

recordTypes.name: Irrigation and/or RPZ (Backflow) Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for an irrigation permit.  This includes replacement of RPZ device and/or installation or replacement of deduct meter.

recordTypes.name: Pool (above and in-ground) and Hot Tub/Spa Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a Pool and/or Spa(Hot Tub) permit for the installation of a new pool or spa.  If additional deck or patio work is to be included in this project a separate permit is required under either deck or patio permit. Please note all permits as part of this project will be held until all reviews are completed.

recordTypes.name: Residential Construction Permit (One and Two Family New Construction or Addition)
recordTypes.description: New Construction or addition for one- or two-family homes.

recordTypes.name: Residential Interior Remodel
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a Residential Interior Remodel Permit.

recordTypes.name: Pavement Sealant Professional License Application
recordTypes.description: Application for Pavement Sealant Professional License for the Village of Deerfield.  Any professional person or company applying pavement sealants within the Village of Deerfield must be licensed, including agreement to not use any coal tar products.  Reference Village Ordinance O-18-07.

recordTypes.name: Re-Roof Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a roofing permit.

recordTypes.name: Sewer Repair Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a sewer repair permit.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a permit for permanent signage.

recordTypes.name: Solar Panels Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a solar panels permit.

recordTypes.name: Special Event / Temporary Use Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Use this application to apply for a Special Event / Temporary Use Permit.

recordTypes.name: Sport Court Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a permit for a sport court ONLY.

recordTypes.name: Telecommunications/Public Utility Permit
recordTypes.description:
Use this form to apply for a public utility installation permit, i.e. fiber optics or utility lines, Comcast, North Shore Gas, AT&T, Verizon, ComEd, etc.  
The term "public utility" includes private companies serving the public, but not municipal utilities that are, in a sense, owned by the public
This does NOT include physical small-cell cellular installations.

recordTypes.name: Temporary Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a temporary sign permit.

recordTypes.name: Uncategorized Project (Permit Required)
recordTypes.description: Permit application for work that requires a permit but does not fit into other permit application record types.

recordTypes.name: Water Service Repair/Replacement Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this form to apply for a water service repair/replacement permit.

categories.name: Building Division
categories.content:
To add or replace document attachments on existing registrations or permits or if requested by Village staff to update other information, please LOG IN to your account using the login link in the top right corner of this page.  Do not re-register or re-apply to make corrections to previous submissions.  

**Please note: We will

categories.name: Department of Public Works and Engineering
categories.content:
The Department of Public Works and Engineering can be reached at 847.317.7245 and is open M-F 7:00AM - 3:30PM (closed for lunch 12:00PM - 1:00PM).

465 Elm St
Deerfield, IL 60015

categories.name: Finance Department
categories.content: The Finance Department may be reached at 847.945.5000 between 8:00AM and 4:30PM Monday through Friday.

categories.name: Planning Division
categories.content: The planning division can be reached at 847.719.7484 or online at https://www.deerfield.il.us/161/Planning-Division

categories.name: Special Events / Village Clerk
categories.content: The Administration Department may be reached at 847.719.7400 between 8:00AM and 4:30PM Monday through Friday.
